dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2063 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the health care provided to veterans of World War II at facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Bilirakis introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve the health care provided to veterans of World War II at facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Provision of health care to veterans of World War II
section.text: Section 1705(a)(6) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking the period at the end and inserting the following: and veterans not covered by paragraphs (1) through (5) who served during World War II..
